Uses of Interface
com.forgerock.reactive.Completable

  • Packages that use Completable 
    Package Description
    com.forgerock.reactive
    Provides asynchronous stream processing with non-blocking back pressure.
    org.forgerock.opendj.ldap
    Classes and interfaces for core types including connections, entries, and attributes.

    • Uses of Completable in com.forgerock.reactive

      Methods in com.forgerock.reactive that return Completable 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Completable RxJavaStreams.completableError​(Throwable error)
      Create a new Completable from the given error.
      Completable Completable.doAfterTerminate​(Action onAfterTerminate)
      Returns a Completable instance that calls the given onTerminate callback after this Completable completes normally or with an exception.
      static Completable RxJavaStreams.newCompletable​(Completable.Emitter onSubscribe)
      Creates a bridge from callback world to Completable.
      Completable Completable.onErrorResumeWith​(org.forgerock.util.Function<Throwable,​Completable,​Exception> function)
      When an error occurs in this completable, continue the processing with the new Completable provided by the function.
      Method parameters in com.forgerock.reactive with type arguments of type Completable 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Completable Completable.onErrorResumeWith​(org.forgerock.util.Function<Throwable,​Completable,​Exception> function)
